description: Viktor Perseo spies Lifetime Exclusive Matthew Rush through the screen of an open-air shower.  Aroused, Viktor approaches and the muscled studs press their cocks against one another through the screen.  When the men can no longer endure the thin veil of separation, they retire to another enclosure to pursue the depths of their mutual desire, probing each other deeply, pushing the limits of temptation, and submitting to the urgency of orgasm.
title: Drenched, Part 1:  Soaking It In
